author: franzoni
body:
In this PR we'll take care of
+ updated pixel cabling (2017 & 2018):
. see: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2815/1/1.html
+ and EGM regressions
. see: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2806.html

The first commit only takes are of pixel cabling. I'll put in the regressions after the first round of tests (full documentation will follow), updating this PR with a new commit
title: updated pixel cabling (2017 & 2018) and EGM regressions
